command.tooltip: Shows the meta-data of all process modells contained in the selected project.

command.tooltip: Updates all breakpoint changes on the engine.

command.tooltip: Unregisteres all breakpoints from the engine.

action.label: Step
action.tooltip: Continues the process instance execution to the next breakpoint

action.label: Reload Fragments from filesystem
action.tooltip: Reload the fragments of the palette from the registry in the file system.

action.label: Iterate instance from activity
action.tooltip: Iterate the current suspended instance from the selected activity.

action.label: Reexecute instance from activity
action.tooltip: Iterate the current suspended instance from the selected activity.

action.label: Jump to activity
action.tooltip: Iterate the current suspended instance from the selected activity.

action.label: Send message
action.tooltip: Send message to the selected IMA.

action.label: Finish
action.tooltip: Finishes the execution of an artificially kept alive process instance.

action.label: Deploy new version
action.tooltip: Deploys a new version of a process model and migrates the actually running instance to the new model.
